title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-11.8 - Reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-11.8 - Reporting requirements

State Regulations

Whenever requested, a nontransplant anatomic bank shall submit reports to the department containing such information and data concerning its activities as may be required by this Part. Such reports shall be signed by the director of the nontransplant anatomic bank. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
52-11.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
